sections.description: Steps in our application and interview process

steps.title: Application Review
steps.description: Our team reviews your application and portfolio within 1 week.

steps.title: Initial Screening
steps.description: 30-minute call with HR to discuss your background and motivation.

steps.title: Technical/Portfolio Review
steps.description: Case study or technical assessment relevant to the role.

steps.title: Team Interviews
steps.description: Meet with team members and department heads.

steps.title: Culture & Values
steps.description: Discussion with leadership about alignment with our mission.

steps.title: Offer

sections.title: Diversity & Inclusion
sections.content: At Pathon, we believe diverse teams build better products. We're committed to creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive, regardless of background, identity, or experience. We actively seek diverse perspectives and encourage applications from underrepresented groups in tech and education.
sections.additionalContent: Equal Opportunity Employer: Pathon is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
